summary: MENA is Emerging as Crypto Capital of the World in 2024, claims Islamic Coin Co-Founder Mohammed AlKaff AlHashmi - The Middle East and North Africa (MENA) region has emerged as a powerful player in the global cryptocurrency economy, ranking sixth among all regions analyzed. MENA recorded a substantial on-chain value of approximately $389.8 billion between July 2022 and June 2023, according to the 2023 edition of the Geography of Cr
